rules_text:
[i]Augmented[/i] – When you cast Thunder Road, if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, copy it twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.
Thunder Road deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.
notes:
Thunder Road — Bruce Springsteen
!done 

RW augmented kinda weird? Fine card though — DB
